title: NI Komplete Kontrol v1.1.0 Update-R2R [deepstatus]

KOMPLETE KONTROL opens up the full potential of KOMPLETE. Feel the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most advanced software instruments come to life under your fingertips Ã¢â‚¬â€œ more intuitive, expressive, and inspirational than ever before.

NATIVE MAPÃ¢â€žÂ¢

DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t lose time mapping parameters to the keyboard. Native MapÃ¢â€žÂ¢ technology automatically maps all key parameters for each KOMPLETE Instrument to the touch-sensitive controller knobs. Everything you need to sculpt your sound Ã¢â‚¬â€œ at your fingers and ready for your creativity.

LIGHT GUIDEÃ¢â€žÂ¢

The innovative Light GuideÃ¢â€žÂ¢ shows you key switches, zones and more in full color, depending on the instrument Ã¢â‚¬â€œ key color corresponds to cell color in BATTERY 4, for example. The lights also provide performance feedback Ã¢â‚¬â€œ see scales, chords, and arpeggios light up across the keyboard.

TRUE PERFORMER

Play chords with single keys or map the entire keyboard to musical scales. Create melodies at the touch of a button with the advanced arpeggiator Ã¢â‚¬â€œ optimized for hands-on performance. And bend, warp and automate sounds like never before with the highly flexible touch strips. 
NOTE:
